alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 12:11PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Jackson, northeastern Bay, northwestern Calhoun and southeastern Washington Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 1245 PM EDT/1145 AM CDT/... At 1211 PM EDT/1111 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles west of Blountstown, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Blountstown, Altha, Moose Pond, Clarksville, Fountain, Singer Road, Chipola, Camps Head, Gainer Spring, Bennett, Youngstown, Porter Lake, Blountstown Airport, Nixon, Betts, Red Oak, Chason, Saunders, Center Lake and Willis. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
